Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.util

Class CommandLineArguments

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.util.CommandLineArguments
public class CommandLineArguments extends Object
A collection of command line arguments passed to the library and utility methods for pasring them.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware

    Constructs a new collection of command line arguments.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommandLineArguments

      public CommandLineArguments(String[] args)
      Constructs a new collection of command line arguments.
      Parameters:
      args - the arguments array passed to the main method

  • Method Details

    • contains

      public boolean contains(String argument)
      Tests whether a given argument is in the collection. If so, the argument is marked as used.
      Parameters:
      argument - the argument to search for
      Returns:
      true if the argument is included, false otherwise

    • get

      public String get(String key, String defaultValue)
      Returns the value immediately after a given key, or a default value if the key is not found. The key and value are marked as used if they are found. Case is ignored.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to search for
      defaultValue - a value to return if the key is not found
      Returns:
      the value immediately after the key in the collection of arguments

    • get

      public String get(String key)
      Returns the value immediately after a given key, or null if the key is not found. The key and value are marked as used if they are found. Case is ignored.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to search for
      Returns:
      the value immediately after the key in the collection of arguments

    • require

      public String require(String key)
      Returns the value immediately after a given key, or throws an exception if the key is not found. The key and value are marked as used if they are found. Case is ignored.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to search for
      Returns:
      the value immediately after the key in the collection of arguments
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the key is not found or if there is no value after the key

    • getOption

      public String getOption(String key, String... options)
      Returns the value immediately after a given key, provided that value is one of a pre-defined list of possible options. If the key is not found, the first option is returned. If the value is no in the pre-defined list, an exceptioon is thrown. The key and value are marked as used if they are found. Case is ignored.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to search for
      options - a pre-defined list of options that may be the value
      Returns:
      the value immediately after the key if it was in the list of options, or the first value if the key was not found or if there was no value after the key
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value found was not one of the pre-defined options

    • getBoolean

      public boolean getBoolean(String key, boolean defaultValue)
      Like get(String, String), but the value returned will be parsed as an boolean.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to search for
      defaultValue - a value to return if the key is not found
      Returns:
      the value, as a boolean
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value cannot be parsed as a boolean

    • getInt

      public int getInt(String key, int defaultValue)
      Like get(String, String), but the value returned will be parsed as an int.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to search for
      defaultValue - a value to return if the key is not found
      Returns:
      the value, as an int
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value cannot be parsed as an int

    • getLong

      public long getLong(String key, long defaultValue)
      Like get(String, String), but the value returned will be parsed as a long.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to search for
      defaultValue - a value to return if the key is not found
      Returns:
      the value, as an long
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value cannot be parsed as a long

    • getDouble

      public double getDouble(String key, double defaultValue)
      Like get(String, String), but the value returned will be parsed as a double.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to search for
      defaultValue - a value to return if the key is not found
      Returns:
      the value, as an double
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value cannot be parsed as a double

    • getFile

      public File getFile(String key)
      Like get(String, String), but the value returned will be parsed as a File.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to search for
      Returns:
      the value, as a File
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file is not found

    • checkUnused

      public void checkUnused()
      Throws an exception if any arguments remain that have not been marked as used.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any arguments are unused
